statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={5.9} , \displaystyle{b}={8.3}, \displaystyle{c}={11.3}, and \displaystyle{d}={13.7}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={10.6}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
